libfacerec documentation¶

libfacerec is a face recognition library for the OpenCV2 C++ API.

  • API
    • FaceRecognizer (Abstract Base Class)
    • Eigenfaces Method
    • Fisherfaces Method
    • Local Binary Patterns Histograms (LBPH)
    • ColorMaps in OpenCV
  • API Examples
    • Eigenfaces Example
    • Fisherfaces Example
    • Local Binary Patterns (LBPH) Histograms Example
    • Saving and Loading a FaceRecognizer
    • Gender Classification with OpenCV (and libfacerec)
    • Working with ColorMap
  • Changelog
    • Release 0.02
    • Release 0.01
